item.title: DJ 2 MELLO UNDERCOVER RNB - WHO IS THE KING AGAIN? PT. 3 LIVE ON MIXTAPE MONSTAS
item.description: The only Rnb Mixtape Dj that never sleeps is back again with another heater for the masses with Undercover RnB - Who's The King Again Pt 3. As always Mello provides you with hot music and a special Public Sevice Announcement to the so called exclusive rnb mixtape dj's. This Mixtape is sure to get the ladies jumpin and the fellas knockin!! Undercover RnB - Who's The King Again Pt 3 1.Nicole Wray - Friend 2.One Chance - You Can't 3.Kelly Rowland - No Man, No Cry 4.Usher - I Can't Win 5.Mariah Carey - Touch My Body 6.Mario Winans - Put Your Love On Me 7.Bobby Valentino - Sexy Girl 8.Rihanna - Don't Stop The Music 9.Shareefa - You Love Him 10.Dj 2Mello - Exclusive Announcement! 11.Raheem Devaughn - Friday 12.Mary J. Blige - Nowhere Fast 13.Trey Songz feat Brandon Hines - Different 14.Janet Jackson - Whats You're Name 15.Cheri Dennis - Caught Up 16.Akon - Come Back To Me 17.Candi Hill - On 1 18.Lloyd feat Ludacris - How We Do It In The A 19.Alicia Keys feat Ludacris - Like You'll Never See Me Again 20.Nicole Sherzinger - Who's Gonna Love You 21.Mario and Ruben - One Side

THIS UNIQUE SHOW DELIVERS QUALITY MUSIC AND A VARIETY OF ARTISTS RANGING FROM UNDERGROUND ARTISTS TO ARTISTS THAT'S ALREADY IN THE GAME. DA INCREDIBLE FT. NOX FORT NOX IS THE FUTURE OF EAST COAST HIP HOP. HIS VERSITILITY AND HUSTLE GAME ARE SECOND TO NONE. COMING FROM THE "SIXTH BORO" NJ, FORT NOX IS A LEADER AMONGST A NEW CLASS OF FOLLOWERS. HIS FIRST SINGLE "KEEP IT HOOD" HAS MADE MAJOR LABELS TAKE NOTICE WITH HEAVY SPINS FROM NYC'S #1 DJ FUNKMASTER FLEX. ALSO THE SONG WAS PUT INTO ROTATION ON XM RADIO CHANNEL 66 RAW FOR 8 WEEKS BY THE SWELL OF REQUESTS BY NATIONWIDE LISTENERS. IN ADDITION TO THAT FT. NOX WAS PLACED ON A REMIX CALLED "DO THE DAMN THING" WITH LIL KIM AND SOCA STAR "RUPEE" ON ATLANTIC RECORDS. THE SONG "DO THE DAMN THING" WHICH WAS ARRANGED BY MULTI-PLATINUM PRODUCER SALAAM REMI, RECEIVED THOUANDS OF BDS DETECTIONS WORLDWIDE. FT. NOX ALSO WROTE THE SONG "LETS GO" FOR CHRIS LOWE'S BLACK LIFE ALBUM WHICH WAS RELEASED ON UNIVERSAL RECORDS JAPAN. FT. NOX HAS ALSO WORKED WITH PLATINUM PRODUCER D.R. PERIOD, MULTI -PLATINUM PRODUCER DJ MARLEY MARL, D-NICE OF BOOGIE DOWN PRODUCTIONS, RAMPAGE OF THE FLIPMODE SQUAD, JACKIE MAGEE, LADY LUCK AND REGAEE LEGEND LADY SAW. FT. NOX'S TELEVISION AND DVD EXPOSURE INCLUDES APPEREANCES ON MUSIC CHOICE, CHANNEL 2 NEWS, WEEKEND VIBE (NBC), VIDEO MUSIC BOX, TRIBAL STREETWEAR DVD- BEYOND FOUR AND COLLECTIVE, NOTORIOUS B.I.G VOLUME 5, JERSEY- IT IS WHAT IT IS AND THA BLOCK DVD. FT. NOX HAS ALSO BEEN A GUEST ON DJ KAY SLAY'S STREETSWEEPER RADIO SHOW ON HOT 97 AND HAS RECEIVED SPINS FROM DJ REVOLUTION ON POWER 106 IN LA, DJ CEASER IN ORLANDO ON 92 JAMS, DJ BROTHER K IN AUSTIN TX, DJ JUST JASE IN TRINADAD, DJ SOFYAN IN KARACHI PAKISTAN, DONALD D IN ITALY, WOLF AND TRICKSTA IN THE UK, LEO G AND MS KITTY ON 66 RAW XM RADIO, THE WONDER TWINZ SHOW ON SIRIUS SATTELITE RADIO, DJ MARLEY MARL ON FUTURE FLAVAZ POWER 105.1, DJ PETER PARKER ON FUTURE FLAVAZ NETWORK, ILLUMINATI RADIO ON FUTURE FLAVAZ NETWORK, DJ RYU ON TOKYO FM, DJ ABSOLUT ON HOT 97,DJ FLASH IN CANADA, MEGATRON'S STREET RADIO SHOW ON HOT 97, DJ CYPHA SOUNDS ON HOT 97, DJ MISTER CEE ON HOT 97 AS WELL AS BIG DOG PITBULL FUNK REGULATA CELO FORMELY OF WKYS IN WASHINGTON DC NOW ON XM RADIO, A HUGE ACHIEVMENT FOR A UNSIGHNED ARTIST. FT.NOX ALSO WAS FEATURED ON A RADIO COMMERCIAL FOR AND 1 SHOE COMPANY THAT WAS AIRED IN 16 MARKETS NATIONWIDE. AS FAR AS PRINT AND ONLINE MAGAZINE EXPOSURE NOX HAS BEEN FEATURED IN THE SOURCE MAGAZINE (NOV 2004), THE BLACK URBAN TIMES, RAGO MAGAZINE IN THE UK, RAPSTATION.COM AND RAP PAGES.COM FT. NOX MIXTAPE APPERANCES ARE TOO ABUNDANT AND CONSTANT TO COUNT! SOME OF THE MOST NOTABLE TAPES ARE STREETSWEEPERS, HEAVY HITTERS, IT'S A NEW DAY BY AV8 RECORDS HOSTED BY AKON, DJ RON G, DJ FINGAZ AND DJ BOBBY TRENDS/FUNKMASTER FLEX JUST TO NAME A FEW. FT.NOX HAS ALSO PERFORMED AT LARGE VENUES SERVING AS OPENING ACT AND HEADLINER AS WELL. HE HAS OPENED UP FOR MARIO WINANS, D-BLOCK, YOUNGBLOODS, G-DEP AND DJ ENUFF. NOX HAS ALSO PERFORMED AT THE GREEKFEST BEACH PARTY AT JONES BEACH LONG ISLAND, NY TWO CONSECUTIVE YEARS. FT. NOX HAS ALSO HOSTED MANY PARTIES AT SOME OF NEW YORK'S MOST ELITE AND EXCLUSIVE NIGHTCLUBS LIKE CLUB CHEETAH, CLUB NV, FLOAT (MONTELL JORDAN ALBUM RELEASE PARTY), CLUB SHOW AFTER PARTY FOR THE (CHRISTOPHER WALLACE FOUNDATION) AND THE POLLADIUM IN NEW ROCHELLE (LL COOL J PARTY). FT. NOX IS HARD WORKING AND DEDICATED WITH A NO NONSENSE ATTITUDE AND ARGUABLY THE MOST UNDER-RATED NEW ARTIST ON THE EAST COAST. HIS ABILITY TO STAY AHEAD OF THE CURVE AND REPRESENT HIS REGION OF THE COUNTRY IS HARD TO DENY. RECENTLY FT. NOX HAS EXPANDED HIS LIST OF ACCOMPLISHMENTS BY SURPASSING HIS ROLE AS JUST AN ARTIST. FT. NOX HAS AUTHORED A BOOK CALLED HUNGER PAINS-TALES OF A STARVING ARTIST AND IS CURRENTLY WORKING ON HIS SECOND BOOK CALLED HIP HOP FOR DUMMIEZ. ALSO FT. NOX IS CO-CEO OF TEAM OSM LLC. TEAM O.S.M. IS A MULTI-FACETED COMPANY WHICH INCLUDES A ROSTER OF ARTISTS, STREET AND EVENT PROMOTION AS WELL AS DISTRIBUTION AND MARKETING SERVICES RECENTLY ACCUIRING LICENSING DEALS WITH ITUNES, NAPSTER, MP3.COM, VERIZON WIRELESS, AMAZON.COM, MP3 MIXTAPE.COM, TOWER RECORDS.COM, BEST BUY.COM AND TMOBILE. TEAM O.S.M. ALSO HAS A BUDDING CLOTHESLINE CURRENTLY AVAILABLE AT VARIOUS ONLINE RETAILERS AS WELL AS A PODCAST RADIO SHOW WITH DJ THATNI**A CALLED TEAM O.S.M. RADIO AND NOX 97, FOLLOWING UP ON HIS FORMER ROLE AS A POPULAR AIR PERSONALITY "THE REAL FT.NOX" WITH OVER 7 MILLION LISTNERS ON XM RADIO. FT.NOX IS DEFINATLY A FREE AGENT WITH FRANCHISE PLAYER POTENTIAL. The information contained in this message is intended only for the recipient, and may be a confidential attorney-client communication or may otherwise be privileged and confidential and protected from disclosure. If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient, or an employee or agent responsible for delivering this message to the intended recipient, please be aware that any dissemination or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please immediately notify us by replying to the message and deleting it from your computer. THANKS YOU CAN'T BEAT US!!!!!!! SO JOIN US!!!!!!!! IT'S ONLY ONE TEAM ON TOP TEAM O.S.M. NOX WAS PLACED ON A REMIX CALLED “DO THE DAMN THING” WITH LIL KIM AND SOCA STAR “RUPEE” ON ATLANTIC RECORDS. THE SONG “DO THE DAMN THING” WHICH WAS ARRANGED BY MULTI-PLATINUM PRODUCER SALAAM REMI, RECEIVED THOUANDS OF BDS DETECTIONS WORLDWIDE. FT. NOX ALSO WROTE THE SONG “LETS GO” FOR CHRIS LOWE’S BLACK LIFE ALBUM WHICH WAS RELEASED ON UNIVERSAL RECORDS JAPAN. FT. NOX HAS ALSO WORKED WITH PLATINUM PRODUCER D.R. PERIOD, MULTI -PLATINUM PRODUCER DJ MARLEY MARL, D-NICE OF BOOGIE DOWN PRODUCTIONS, RAMPAGE OF THE FLIPMODE SQUAD, JACKIE MAGEE, LADY LUCK AND REGAEE LEGEND LADY SAW. FT. WALIYY DIXON AKA (MAIN EVENT) Original member of AND 1 team. High School: Linden, NJ College: Rutgers University, NJ, Other Experience: USBL. Was in camp with the New Jersey Nets before the 2004-2005 NBA season. Earned Street Name: Back at Rucker Park in the early 90s Main did a 360 degree dunk that stunned the crowd and earned him the name the "Main Event" as he attracted a huge following to Rucker games. Joined Mix Tape Tour: Back in the summer of 1999, before the AND 1 Mix Tape Tour ever existed, Main met some people from AND 1. After discussing the streetball scene he helped bring other streetballers to the AND 1 family including Shane the Dribbling Machine and Half Man Half Amazing and worked with AND 1 to throw the original AND 1 Mix Tape game later that summer at his home court in Linden, NJ. Now 2007!!!! Main Event has left the AND 1 and will be on the Streetball Tour starting June 2007 starting in Seatle, WA.
DA INCREDIBLE FT. NOX
FORT NOX IS THE FUTURE OF EAST COAST HIP HOP. HIS VERSITILITY AND HUSTLE GAME ARE SECOND TO NONE. COMING FROM THE "SIXTH BORO" NJ, FORT NOX IS A LEADER AMONGST A NEW CLASS OF FOLLOWERS.
HIS FIRST SINGLE "KEEP IT HOOD" HAS MADE MAJOR LABELS TAKE NOTICE WITH HEAVY SPINS FROM NYC'S #1 DJ FUNKMASTER FLEX. ALSO THE SONG WAS PUT INTO ROTATION ON XM RADIO CHANNEL 66 RAW FOR 8 WEEKS BY THE SWELL OF REQUESTS BY NATIONWIDE LISTENERS. IN ADDITION TO THAT FT. NOX WAS PLACED ON A REMIX CALLED "DO THE DAMN THING" WITH LIL KIM AND SOCA STAR "RUPEE" ON ATLANTIC RECORDS. THE SONG "DO THE DAMN THING" WHICH WAS ARRANGED BY MULTI-PLATINUM PRODUCER SALAAM REMI, RECEIVED THOUANDS OF BDS DETECTIONS WORLDWIDE. FT. NOX ALSO WROTE THE SONG "LETS GO" FOR CHRIS LOWE'S BLACK LIFE ALBUM WHICH WAS RELEASED ON UNIVERSAL RECORDS JAPAN. FT. NOX HAS ALSO WORKED WITH PLATINUM PRODUCER D.R. PERIOD, MULTI -PLATINUM PRODUCER DJ MARLEY MARL, D-NICE OF BOOGIE DOWN PRODUCTIONS, RAMPAGE OF THE FLIPMODE SQUAD, JACKIE MAGEE, LADY LUCK AND REGAEE LEGEND LADY SAW.
FT. NOX'S TELEVISION AND DVD EXPOSURE INCLUDES APPEREANCES ON MUSIC CHOICE, CHANNEL 2 NEWS, WEEKEND VIBE (NBC), VIDEO MUSIC BOX, TRIBAL STREETWEAR DVD- BEYOND FOUR AND COLLECTIVE, NOTORIOUS B.I.G VOLUME 5, JERSEY- IT IS WHAT IT IS AND THA BLOCK DVD.
FT. NOX HAS ALSO BEEN A GUEST ON DJ KAY SLAY'S STREETSWEEPER RADIO SHOW ON HOT 97 AND HAS RECEIVED SPINS FROM DJ REVOLUTION ON POWER 106 IN LA, DJ CEASER IN ORLANDO ON 92 JAMS, DJ BROTHER K IN AUSTIN TX, DJ JUST JASE IN TRINADAD, DJ SOFYAN IN KARACHI PAKISTAN, DONALD D IN ITALY, WOLF AND TRICKSTA IN THE UK, LEO G AND MS KITTY ON 66 RAW XM RADIO, THE WONDER TWINZ SHOW ON SIRIUS SATTELITE RADIO, DJ MARLEY MARL ON FUTURE FLAVAZ POWER 105.1, DJ PETER PARKER ON FUTURE FLAVAZ NETWORK, ILLUMINATI RADIO ON FUTURE FLAVAZ NETWORK, DJ RYU ON TOKYO FM, DJ ABSOLUT ON HOT 97,DJ FLASH IN CANADA, MEGATRO(continued)

OSM TV VOL. 1 - BALL 4 LIFE "INSIDE THE LIFE OF A STREETBALL LEGEND" COMING SOON!!!!!!
CATCH MAIN EVENT & FORT NOX ON THE 30 CITY STREETBALL TOUR THIS SUMMER 2007!!!!!!!
WALIYY DIXON AKA (MAIN EVENT) Original member of AND 1 team. High School: Linden, NJ College: Rutgers University, NJ, Other Experience: USBL. Was in camp with the New Jersey Nets before the 2004-2005 NBA season. Earned Street Name: Back at Rucker Park in the early 90s Main did a 360 degree dunk that stunned the crowd and earned him the name the "Main Event" as he attracted a huge following to Rucker games. Joined Mix Tape Tour: Back in the summer of 1999, before the AND 1 Mix Tape Tour ever existed, Main met some people from AND 1. After discussing the streetball scene he helped bring other streetballers to the AND 1 family including Shane the Dribbling Machine and Half Man Half Amazing and worked with AND 1 to throw the original AND 1 Mix Tape game later that summer at his home court in Linden, NJ. Now 2007!!!! Main Event has left the AND 1 and will be on the Streetball Tour starting June 2007 starting in Seatle, WA.
DA INCREDIBLE FT. NOX
FORT NOX IS THE FUTURE OF EAST COAST HIP HOP. HIS VERSITILITY AND HUSTLE GAME ARE SECOND TO NONE. COMING FROM THE "SIXTH BORO" NJ, FORT NOX IS A LEADER AMONGST A NEW CLASS OF FOLLOWERS.
HIS FIRST SINGLE "KEEP IT HOOD" HAS MADE MAJOR LABELS TAKE NOTICE WITH HEAVY SPINS FROM NYC'S #1 DJ FUNKMASTER FLEX. ALSO THE SONG WAS PUT INTO ROTATION ON XM RADIO CHANNEL 66 RAW FOR 8 WEEKS BY THE SWELL OF REQUESTS BY NATIONWIDE LISTENERS. IN ADDITION TO THAT FT. NOX WAS PLACED ON A REMIX CALLED "DO THE DAMN THING" WITH LIL KIM AND SOCA STAR "RUPEE" ON ATLANTIC RECORDS. THE SONG "DO THE DAMN THING" WHICH WAS ARRANGED BY MULTI-PLATINUM PRODUCER SALAAM REMI, RECEIVED THOUANDS OF BDS DETECTIONS WORLDWIDE. FT. NOX ALSO WROTE THE SONG "LETS GO" FOR CHRIS LOWE'S BLACK LIFE ALBUM WHICH WAS RELEASED ON UNIVERSAL RECORDS JAPAN. FT. NOX HAS ALSO WORKED WITH PLATINUM PRODUCER D.R. PERIOD, MULTI -PLATINUM PRODUCER DJ MARLEY MARL, D-NICE OF BOOGIE DOWN PRODUCTIONS, RAMPAGE OF THE FLIPMODE SQUAD, JACKIE MAGEE, LADY LUCK AND REGAEE LEGEND LADY SAW.
FT. NOX'S TELEVISION AND DVD EXPOSURE INCLUDES APPEREANCES ON MUSIC CHOICE, CHANNEL 2 NEWS, WEEKEND VIBE (NBC), VIDEO MUSIC BOX, TRIBAL STREETWEAR DVD- BEYOND FOUR AND COLLECTIVE, NOTORIOUS B.I.G VOLUME 5, JERSEY- IT IS WHAT IT IS AND THA BLOCK DVD.
FT. NOX HAS ALSO BEEN A GUEST ON DJ KAY SLAY'S STREETSWEEPER RADIO SHOW ON HOT 97 AND HAS RECEIVED SPINS FROM DJ REVOLUTION ON POWER 106 IN LA, DJ CEASER IN ORLANDO ON 92 JAMS, DJ BROTHER K IN AUSTIN TX, DJ JUST JASE IN TRINADAD, DJ SOFYAN IN KARACHI PAKISTAN, DONALD D IN ITALY, WOLF AND TRICKSTA IN THE UK, LEO G AND MS KITTY ON 66 RAW XM RADIO, THE WONDER TWINZ SHOW ON SIRIUS SATTELITE RADIO, DJ MARLEY MARL ON FUTURE FLAVAZ POWER 105.1, DJ PETER PARKER ON FUTURE FLAVAZ NETWORK, ILLUMINATI RADIO ON FUTURE FLAVAZ NETWORK, DJ RYU ON TOKYO FM, DJ ABS(continued)

item.title: "BONE THUGS N HARMONY FEAT. THE GAME & WILL.I.AM - STREETS" LIVE ON TEAM OSM NETWORK NEWS
item.description: The rise of Cleveland's Bone Thugs-N-Harmony is a classic example of the American Dream, a group of five young "brothas" who had a goal and would not allow any barriers to stop from attaining this goal. Layzie Bone, Krayzie Bone, Wish Bone, Flesh-N-Bone and Bizzy Bone went from being broke, hungry and homeless in 1993 to watching their brand of flowing, rolling, rapid-clip, harmonized rap -- dubbed the "Cleveland Sound" -- hit the top of the charts. In November 1993, they bought one-way Greyhound tickets to Los Angeles determined to prove their talents to their favorite rapper, the late Eric "Eazy-E" Wright of N.W.A. fame. They spent months living on the street, constantly trying to contact Eazy-E, until they finally received a call from him. They rapped for him on the phone. He said he'd get back with them, but never did. When they learned Eazy was doing a show in Cleveland, they hustled up more money for bus tickets and headed back. They found him backstage and after their second audition, Eazy signed them to his Ruthless Records label. Bone's debut single, "Thuggish Ruggish Bone," sold more than 500,000 copies and the video was the cable music channel the Box's most-requested of 1994. Their Ruthless/ Relativity EP debut, Creepin' On Ah Come Up, started moving large quantities shortly after its June 1994 release, shot past triple-platinum sales and became an R&B, and Rap chart topper. As the EP continued its reign atop the charts, the group began work on their debut LP, E. 1999 Eternal. The new album was released in 1995, and proved a great blend of sweet soul harmonies and boulevard mentalities. The album's tribute to their dead homies, called "See You At The Crossroads," became an MTV smash hit, launching them into mainstream radio play. The song took on an unexpected meaning after Eazy-E's March 1995 death. The group's latest efforts have been: BTNHResurrection, was released in 2000 and Thug World Order, released in 2003. After discussing the streetball scene he helped bring other streetballers to the AND 1 family including Shane the Dribbling Machine and Half Man Half Amazing and worked with AND 1 to throw the original AND 1 Mix Tape game later that summer at his home court in Linden, NJ. Now 2007!!!! Main Event has left the AND 1 and will be on the Streetball Tour starting June 2007 starting in Seatle, WA. DA INCREDIBLE FT. NOX FORT NOX IS THE FUTURE OF EAST COAST HIP HOP. HIS VERSITILITY AND HUSTLE GAME ARE SECOND TO NONE. COMING FROM THE "SIXTH BORO" NJ, FORT NOX IS A LEADER AMONGST A NEW CLASS OF FOLLOWERS. HIS FIRST SINGLE "KEEP IT HOOD" HAS MADE MAJOR LABELS TAKE NOTICE WITH HEAVY SPINS FROM NYC'S #1 DJ FUNKMASTER FLEX. ALSO THE SONG WAS PUT INTO ROTATION ON XM RADIO CHANNEL 66 RAW FOR 8 WEEKS BY THE SWELL OF REQUESTS BY NATIONWIDE LISTENERS. IN ADDITION TO THAT FT. NOX WAS PLACED ON A REMIX CALLED "DO THE DAMN THING" WITH LIL KIM AND SOCA STAR "RUPEE" ON ATLANTIC RECORDS. THE SONG "DO THE DAMN THING" WHICH WAS ARRANGED BY MULTI-PLATINUM PRODUCER SALAAM REMI, RECEIVED THOUANDS OF BDS DETECTIONS WORLDWIDE. FT. NOX ALSO WROTE THE SONG "LETS GO" FOR CHRIS LOWE'S BLACK LIFE ALBUM WHICH WAS RELEASED ON UNIVERSAL RECORDS JAPAN. FT. NOX HAS ALSO WORKED WITH PLATINUM PRODUCER D.R. PERIOD, MULTI -PLATINUM PRODUCER DJ MARLEY MARL, D-NICE OF BOOGIE DOWN PRODUCTIONS, RAMPAGE OF THE FLIPMODE SQUAD, JACKIE MAGEE, LADY LUCK AND REGAEE LEGEND LADY SAW. FT. NOX'S TELEVISION AND DVD EXPOSURE INCLUDES APPEREANCES ON MUSIC CHOICE, CHANNEL 2 NEWS, WEEKEND VIBE (NBC), VIDEO MUSIC BOX, TRIBAL STREETWEAR DVD- BEYOND FOUR AND COLLECTIVE, NOTORIOUS B.I.G VOLUME 5, JERSEY- IT IS WHAT IT IS AND THA BLOCK DVD. FT. NOX HAS ALSO BEEN A GUEST ON DJ KAY SLAY'S STREETSWEEPER RADIO SHOW ON HOT 97 AND HAS RECEIVED SPINS FROM DJ REVOLUTION ON POWER 106 IN LA, DJ CEASER IN ORLANDO ON 92 JAMS, DJ BROTHER K IN AUSTIN TX, DJ JUST JASE IN TRINADAD, DJ SOFYAN IN KARACHI PAKISTAN, DONALD D IN ITALY, WOLF AND TRICKSTA IN THE UK, LEO G AND MS KITTY ON 66 RAW XM RADIO, THE WONDER TWINZ SHOW ON SIRIUS SATTELITE RADIO, DJ MARLEY MARL ON FUTURE FLAVAZ POWER 105.1, DJ PETER PARKER ON FUTURE FLAVAZ NETWORK, ILLUMINATI RADIO ON FUTURE FLAVAZ NETWORK, DJ RYU ON TOKYO FM, DJ ABSOLUT ON HOT 97,DJ FLASH IN CANADA, MEGATRON'S STREET RADIO SHOW ON HOT 97, DJ CYPHA SOUNDS ON HOT 97, DJ MISTER CEE ON HOT 97 AS WELL AS BIG DOG PITBULL FUNK REGULATA CELO FORMELY OF WKYS IN WASHINGTON DC NOW ON XM RADIO, A HUGE ACHIEVMENT FOR A UNSIGHNED ARTIST. FT.NOX ALSO WAS FEATURED ON A RADIO COMMERCIAL FOR AND 1 SHOE COMPANY THAT WAS AIRED IN 16 MARKETS NATIONWIDE. AS FAR AS PRINT AND ONLINE MAGAZINE EXPOSURE NOX HAS BEEN FEATURED IN THE SOURCE MAGAZINE (NOV 2004), THE BLACK URBAN TIMES, RAGO MAGAZINE IN THE UK, RAPSTATION.COM AND RAP PAGES.COM FT. NOX MIXTAPE APPERANCES ARE TOO ABUNDANT AND CONSTANT TO COUNT! SOME OF THE MOST NOTABLE TAPES ARE STREETSWEEPERS, HEAVY HITTERS, IT'S A NEW DAY BY AV8 RECORDS HOSTED BY AKON, DJ RON G, DJ FINGAZ AND DJ BOBBY TRENDS/FUNKMASTER FLEX JUST TO NAME A FEW. FT.NOX HAS ALSO PERFORMED AT LARGE VENUES SERVING AS OPENING ACT AND HEADLINER AS WELL. HE HAS OPENED UP FOR MARIO WINANS, D-BLOCK, YOUNGBLOODS, G-DEP AND DJ ENUFF. NOX HAS ALSO PERFORMED AT THE GREEKFEST BEACH PARTY AT JONES BEACH LONG ISLAND, NY TWO CONSECUTIVE YEARS. FT. NOX HAS ALSO HOSTED MANY PARTIES AT SOME OF NEW YORK'S MOST ELITE AND EXCLUSIVE NIGHTCLUBS LIKE CLUB CHEETAH, CLUB NV, FLOAT (MONTELL JORDAN ALBUM RELEASE PARTY), CLUB SHOW AFTER PARTY FOR THE (CHRISTOPHER WALLACE FOUNDATION) AND THE POLLADIUM IN NEW ROCHELLE (LL COOL J PARTY). FT. NOX IS HARD WORKING AND DEDICATED WITH A NO NONSENSE ATTITUDE AND ARGUABLY THE MOST UNDER-RATED NEW ARTIST ON THE EAST COAST. HIS ABILITY TO STAY AHEAD OF THE CURVE AND REPRESENT HIS REGION OF THE COUNTRY IS HARD TO DENY. RECENTLY FT. NOX HAS EXPANDED HIS LIST OF ACCOMPLISHMENTS BY SURPASSING HIS ROLE AS JUST AN ARTIST. FT. NOX HAS AUTHORED A BOOK CALLED HUNGER PAINS-TALES OF A STARVING ARTIST AND IS CURRENTLY WORKING ON HIS SECOND BOOK CALLED HIP HOP FOR DUMMIEZ. ALSO FT. NOX IS CO-CEO OF TEAM OSM LLC. TEAM O.S.M. IS A MULTI-FACETED COMPANY WHICH INCLUDES A ROSTER OF ARTISTS, STREET AND EVENT PROMOTION AS WELL AS DISTRIBUTION AND MARKETING SERVICES RECENTLY ACCUIRING LICENSING DEALS WITH ITUNES, NAPSTER, MP3.COM, VERIZON WIRELESS, AMAZON.COM, MP3 MIXTAPE.COM, TOWER RECORDS.COM, BEST BUY.COM AND TMOBILE. TEAM O.S.M. ALSO HAS A BUDDING CLOTHESLINE CURRENTLY AVAILABLE AT VARIOUS ONLINE RETAILERS AS WELL AS A PODCAST RADIO SHOW WITH DJ THATNI**A CALLED TEAM O.S.M. RADIO AND NOX 97, FOLLOWING UP ON HIS FORMER ROLE AS A POPULAR AIR PERSONALITY "THE REAL FT.NOX" WITH OVER 7 MILLION LISTNERS ON XM RADIO. FT.NOX IS DEFINATLY A FREE AGENT WITH FRANCHISE PLAYER POTENTIAL. -- DA INCREDIBLE FT. NOX - "PLEASE LISTEN TO MY DEMO" IN STORE NOW ON YOUR ITUNES. MAIN EVENT FT.
